column4: anyone is experiencing problems with Dropbox and Oneiric Nautilus integration? I cannot see the dropbox icon anymore... there is not the "Dropbox" contextual menu on each file ecc...
working fine here
maybe I should re-install it?
ok, a simple reinstall was enough #DropBox :)
blame the switch

I know.... but it must work. It works if you FIRST boot the PC normally, then you connect the switch, so I'd like to force the resolution to 1680x1050 since I know that works even with the switch connected
probably easiest to craft an xorg.conf which specifies the necessary modelines and resolutions
exactly..... but before messing the xorg.conf I'd like to test the settings with xrandr :P
you can add modes to xrandr manually
xorg --help
xrandr --help
I was giving a look to this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/Nvidia but it only says: xrandr --addmode S-video ... not a good example :P
you need newmode first
http://paste.ubuntu.com/817373/ <- like that
let me try that example... it should work
i used gtf to get the modeline
no, it doesn't.... xrandr: Failed to get size of gamma for output default
I tried the commands you copy-pasted on paste.ubuntu....
that was just an example
you're right, but I don't know all values.... for example: xrandr --newmode "1280x720_60.00"  74.48  1280 1336 1472 1664  720 721 724 746  -HSync +Vsync - what is that 74.48?
as I said... use gtf to generate the modeline
bobo37773 both the videomode generated by cvt or gft fail.
